name: submgmss
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: simpld(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c0, c2), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cmgm))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(csubmgm, c1)), wa(wss(c0, c2), wcel(co(c1, cress, c0), cmgm)))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)→ c0 ⊆ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈(SubMgm ` c1)→(c0 ⊆ c2 ∧(c1[|`s]c0)∈ Mgm))
